## Setup

### Libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

###  Parameters
```{r}
all_tweets_pathname <- "all_tweets_clean 2.tsv"
filtered_tweets_pathname <- "filtered_tweets_clean.tsv"
```

## Load Data
```{r}
all_tweets <-
  all_tweets_pathname %>%
  read_tsv(quote = " ")

filtered_tweets <-
  filtered_tweets_pathname %>% 
  read_tsv()
```
